channel.title: Cant connect to local host - Paying RS gold for help
channel.description:
ok so last night i was just messing around and downloaded a couple of servers and clients, they were working fine and i was just running them on my laptop for me to play on (connecting to local host). however today when i start up the server run.bat that works fine, then i open up the client and it just gets stuck on the connecting to server screen then in the CMD box i get the message error_game_js5crc. this happens on every different server and client i download. what is wrong?
yes i am connecting to my IP 127.0 etc...

item.title: Cant connect to local host - Paying RS gold for help
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

[quote=“m4k o w n s, post:10, topic:426971”]SOLVED

belive it or not but utorrent was the problem… i closed utorrent and everything works perfectly[/quote]

^^ Plox its already been fixed

Read full topic
item.source: Cant connect to local host - Paying RS gold for help

item.title: Cant connect to local host - Paying RS gold for help
item.dc:creator: @dddylan98 dddylan98
item.description:
@dddylan98 wrote:

[quote=“24man30, post:12, topic:426971”][quote author=m4k o w n s link=topic=529671.msg3865945#msg3865945 date=1325009143]
ok so last night i was just messing around and downloaded a couple of servers and clients, they were working fine and i was just running them on my laptop for me to play on (connecting to local host). however today when i start up the server run.bat that works fine, then i open up the client and it just gets stuck on the connecting to server screen then in the CMD box i get the message error_game_js5crc. this happens on every different server and client i download. what is wrong?

yes i am connecting to my IP 127.0 etc…
[/quote] You have to start the run.bat or something close to that in your source. (The one with config folder or files) ThEN RUN CLIENT AND ENJoy![/quote]

Shaking my head. Read pl0x?

Read full topic
item.source: Cant connect to local host - Paying RS gold for help

item.title: Cant connect to local host - Paying RS gold for help
item.dc:creator: @24man30 24man30
item.description:
@24man30 wrote:

[quote=“m4k o w n s, post:1, topic:426971”]ok so last night i was just messing around and downloaded a couple of servers and clients, they were working fine and i was just running them on my laptop for me to play on (connecting to local host). however today when i start up the server run.bat that works fine, then i open up the client and it just gets stuck on the connecting to server screen then in the CMD box i get the message error_game_js5crc. this happens on every different server and client i download. what is wrong?

yes i am connecting to my IP 127.0 etc…[/quote] You have to start the run.bat or something close to that in your source. (The one with config folder or files) ThEN RUN CLIENT AND ENJoy!

Read full topic

item.title: Cant connect to local host - Paying RS gold for help
item.dc:creator: @Kayceee Kayceee
item.description:
@Kayceee wrote:

Definitely sounds like something with your cache…
delete every cache folder you have on your pc and try again, then make sure its grabbing it from the right directory…
